name: BWL Poll Manager Lite
author: Md Mahbub Alam Khan

sections.description:
Live Demo | User Guide | Pro Version

BWL Poll Manager provides you with a great way to create a complete custom poll system for your WordPress-powered website. You can easily create unlimited numbers of custom polls with endless options and then use them via Shortcode anywhere on your website, like pages, posts, or inside custom posts. Check the plugin features.

  • – Create Polls With Unlimited Options.
  • – Single and multiple answer options.
  • – Drag & Drop Options Sorting.
  • – Custom Build Shortcode Editor.
  • – 3 Predefined Poll Result Bar.
  • – Color Customization.
  • – One Click Poll Reset Option.
  • – One Vote From One IP Address.
  • – RTL support.
  • – Responsive Layout.
  • – Ready for localization.
  • – Support WP Latest Version.

Pro Version Additional Features

  • – Display Poll In Modal/Popup Window.
  • – Extensive Poll Option Panel for customization.
  • – Eye catching PIE chart to display result.
  • – Built-in widgets to display polls in sidebar.
  • – Set maximum number of votes From a single IP Address.
  • – Hide Poll Result.
  • – Display Random Polls.
  • – Login Filter ( Required register and login to vote).
  • – Premium 6 Months Free Support From Developer.
  • – Well Documentation.

Get The Pro Version
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/bwl-poll-manager-lite directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the BWL Poll Lite->Add Poll to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Can I reset votes of a poll?

Yes, you can. Using quick edit method, you can easily reset total number of votes.
